gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. Now I want to train a large language model for code comment generation tasks specifically focused on Verilog RTL codes. And I want you to help me process the raw data, transforming it into suitable formats that can serve as inputs and outputs for the model.

Name of the module and its functionality is as follows: 
I'm sorry, but the provided code seems to be corrupted or improperly encoded, so I am unable to extract any usable information from it. Could you please provide the Verilog RTL code again in a readable format? This will allow me to identify the module name and explain its functionality.

Input and output ports and their explanation is as follows: 
Sorry, but the given Verilog code seems to be corrupted or improperly encoded. As a result, it's impossible to derive any module details from it, such as names or functionality of input and output ports. Please provide the code in a readable format so that I can provide an accurate response.

Internal signals and their explanation is as follows: 
I'm sorry but I cannot provide you with the list or explanation of internal signals used in the module. The provided Verilog code seems to be corrupted or improperly encoded, and I am unable to read or understand it. To assist you with your queries, I need the code in a readable and correct format. Please check the code and provide it again so that I can help you in a better way.
